text: I like how this person’s theory of power basically reduces to “if you don’t like what I post I will retweet whatever selectively cropped screenshots of a private convo that someone who likes me and doesn’t like you posted” yeah do your thing man lol

and the thing she immediately does after blocking me is retweeting (for the like third time) an insane thread about how I once told an annoying account to fuck off lol. the british shouldn’t be allowed on this site
